Name: Dad
Text: ...so, boy... did you mow any lawns this afternoon? Prune any bushes?

Name: You
Text: Oh, uh.. I went with the paper route...

Name: Dad
Text: WHAT?! Hanging around that old man McLudum? I don't bloody think so!

Name: Dad
Text: What's he giving you anyway.. Couple a bucks per paper? Show me...

Name: Dad
Text: How do you expect to pay ME for what YOU broke with this kind of cash?

Name: Dad
Text: You better deliver a LOT more papers or so help me...
